mapper.sql: code_id AS "codeId", pid AS "pid", simple_name AS "simpleName", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser"
mapper.select: select code_id AS id, pid as "pId", simple_name as name, ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as "open" from sys_code

select
from sys_code where 1 = 1
and simple_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or full_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
and pid = #{codeId} order by code_id ASC
select code_id AS tags, pid as "parentId", simple_name as text from sys_code

select
from sys_dept where 1 = 1
and pids LIKE CONCAT('%$[',#{deptId},'$]%') escape '$'
